roleset.name: to sew a design into textiles

example.name: descriptive
example.text: When their majesties had finished * playing *T*, their equipment was not put * away in bags, but placed in brocaded cases.

example.name: All arguments, made-up
example.text: Mary brocade the words "his" and "hers" into the towels.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'brocade' based on ectb2 instances. No VerbNet entry.
